title: Ticket #4252: DAGMan node status file test improvements
description:
We should make a couple of improvements to the tests of the DAGMan node status file:
  • Check the state of the file during the DAG run, not just at the end.
  • Check the node status file with a removed DAGMan.

I think we can do the first of these by having one of the node jobs copy the node status file to a temporary file, and then checking that temporary file in the test .run file. (Have to watch out for a race condition of copying the file before it gets updated to match the latest status.)
